FuncDef: This command defines the frame loss threshold used to determine whether the delta-t is available or unavailable. An individual delta-t with a frame loss threshold equal to or higher than the configured threshold will be marked unavailable. An individual delta-t with a frame loss threshold lower than the configured threshold will be marked as available.

ParaDef.Info: The percentage of the threshold. Values-0 to 100. ParamDefault: Default- 50
